physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Aaron was noted to have linear thoughts and carry on a clear, coherent conversation with no evidence of disorganization of thoughts.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: His hygiene had dramatically deteriorated since the initial evaluation; he presented with stained clothing and severe body odor.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: During hospitalization, he reported extreme paranoia mixed with auditory hallucinations. He experienced auditory hallucinations, including hearing his girlfriendâ€™s voice when no one was there.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially, he had some insight into his symptoms but later lost this insight, as indicated by his acute paranoia and the belief that he was hearing the voice of God.
